title: Ghostwrite Content Input
description: Input schema for the ghostwrite-content skill

client_id.description: Firebase Client ID. If not provided, reads from inputs/active_client.md

client_name.description: Client display name (optional, defaults to client_id)

tenant_id.description: Tenant identifier for budget tracking (defaults to client_id)

min_relevance.description: Minimum relevance score for source posts

execution_mode.description: Execution mode: suggest (read-only), preview (show changes), execute (apply changes)

context_only.description: Generate context snapshot files only (no posts generated)

auto_topics.description: Auto-select top-scoring topics without user interaction

voice_contract.description: Voice contract defining founder's writing style. If not provided, loaded from Firebase.
